avatar.description: Designates a specific src image to pass to the thumbnail.
avatar.description_zh: 指定要传递给缩略图的特定 src 图像。

bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control’s background. Used on components that also support the color prop. - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
bg-color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件的背景。用于也支持 color 属性的组件。- 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 CSS 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

border.description: Apply a border style to the component.

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用程序颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（例如成功或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在颜色页面上查找内置类的列表。

density.description: Adjusts the vertical height used by the component.
density.description_zh: 调整组件使用的垂直高度。

elevation.description: The elevation of the component is acceptable from 0 to 24. You can read more on the Elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 组件的海拔可接受 0 到 24 之间的值。你可以在 elevation page 浏览更多信息。

height.description: Sets the height of the component.

icon.description: Assign a v-icon icon to the button.
icon.description_zh: 为按钮指定一个 v-icon 图标。

lines.description: The amount of visible lines of text before it truncates.
lines.description_zh: 截断之前可见文本行的数量。

location.description: Specifies the component’s location. Can combine by using a space separated string.
location.description_zh: 指定组件的位置。可以使用空格分隔的字符串进行组合。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height of the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width of the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height of the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width of the component.

mobile-breakpoint.description_zh: 缺少描述 （在 github 中编辑）

position.description: Sets the position for the component.

rounded.description: Applies the border-radius style to the specified component. You can get more information about this on the Corner Radius of Borders page
rounded.description_zh: 对指定的组件应用 border-radius 样式。您可以在 边框的圆角半径页面 获取更多有关信息

stacked.description: Forces the banner actions onto a new line. This is not applicable when the banner has lines="one".
stacked.description_zh: 将横幅操作强制到新行上。当横幅的 lines=“one” 时，这不适用。

sticky.description: Applies position: sticky to the component with top: 0. You can find more information on the MDN documentation for sticky position.
sticky.description_zh: 将 position： sticky 应用于 top： 0 的组件。 您可以在 MDN 文档中找到有关粘性位置的更多信息。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

text.description: Sets the content text of the component.

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

width.description: Sets the width of the component.

slots.name: actions
slots.description: The slot used for the action’s content such as a v-btn.
slots.description_zh: 用于操作内容的插槽，例如 v-btn。

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Adds an item outside the input and before input content.
slots.description_zh: 在输入内容之外和输入内容之前添加一个项目。

slots.name: text
slots.description: Slot for the component’s text content.
